attrFallbackBSSRDF.name: fallback_bssrdf
attrFallbackBSSRDF.label: fallback bssrdf
attrFallbackBSSRDF.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of bssrdf, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackSpecularModel.name: fallback_specular_model
attrFallbackSpecularModel.label: fallback specular model
attrFallbackSpecularModel.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of specular model, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackToonSpecularModel.name: fallback_toon_specular_model
attrFallbackToonSpecularModel.label: fallback toon specular model
attrFallbackToonSpecularModel.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of toon specular model, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackOuterSpecularModel.name: fallback_outer_specular_model
attrFallbackOuterSpecularModel.label: fallback outer specular model
attrFallbackOuterSpecularModel.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of outer specular model, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackOuterSpecularUseBending.name: fallback_clearcoat_use_bending
attrFallbackOuterSpecularUseBending.label: fallback clearcoat use bending
attrFallbackOuterSpecularUseBending.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of clearcoat use bending, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackThinGeometry.name: fallback_thin_geometry
attrFallbackThinGeometry.label: fallback thin geometry
attrFallbackThinGeometry.comment: If child materials disagree on the type of thin geometry, this type will be used instead.

attrFallbackPreventLightCulling.name: fallback_prevent_light_culling
attrFallbackPreventLightCulling.label: fallback prevent light culling
attrFallbackPreventLightCulling.comment: If child materials disagree on prevent light culling, this will be used instead.

attrColorSpace.name: blend_color_space
attrColorSpace.label: blend color space
attrColorSpace.comment: Color space used when blending the two material's color parameters

attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.name: sss_trace_set
attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.label: sss trace set
attrSubsurfaceTraceSet.comment: By default, only the geometry associated with this material contributes to subsurface. The DwaLayerMaterial ignores the sss trace sets of the submaterials. If you want adjacent geometry with different material to contribute as well, specify all those parts here.

attrFallbackGlitterSeed.name: fallback_glitter_seed
attrFallbackGlitterSeed.comment: The seed for the glitter random number generator.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterSpace.name: fallback_glitter_space
attrFallbackGlitterSpace.label: fallback glitter space
attrFallbackGlitterSpace.comment: The space to calculate the worley noise in, defaults to reference space.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterRandomness.name: fallback_glitter_randomness
attrFallbackGlitterRandomness.label: fallback glitter randomness
attrFallbackGlitterRandomness.comment: randomness of flake orientation.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterStyleAFrequency.name: fallback_glitter_style_A_frequency
attrFallbackGlitterStyleAFrequency.label: fallback glitter style A frequency
attrFallbackGlitterStyleAFrequency.comment: 0 implies none of this style, 1 implies all the flakes will get this style.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterTextureA.name: fallback_glitter_texture_A
attrFallbackGlitterTextureA.label: fallback glitter texture A
attrFallbackGlitterTextureA.comment: filename that points to a texture .exr or .tx file (must be mip-mapped and tiled with maketx).  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterStyleBFrequency.name: fallback_glitter_style_B_frequency
attrFallbackGlitterStyleBFrequency.label: fallback glitter style B frequency
attrFallbackGlitterStyleBFrequency.comment: 0 implies none of this style, 1 implies all the flakes will get this style.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterTextureB.name: fallback_glitter_texture_B
attrFallbackGlitterTextureB.label: fallback glitter texture B
attrFallbackGlitterTextureB.comment: filename that points to a texture .exr or .tx file (must be mip-mapped and tiled with maketx).  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterLodQuality.name: fallback_glitter_LOD_quality
attrFallbackGlitterLodQuality.label: fallback glitter LOD quality
attrFallbackGlitterLodQuality.comment: controls quality of glitter at distances where individual flakes cannot be perceived; at lower values, approximation kicks in earlier.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterLayeringMode.name: fallback_glitter_layering_mode
attrFallbackGlitterLayeringMode.label: fallback glitter layering mode
attrFallbackGlitterLayeringMode.comment: layering mode for glitter on top of the under material. physical: conserves energy and glitter attenuates under material, additive: breaks energy conservation but glitter is never darker than the under material (eg. use case: snow).  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.

attrFallbackGlitterDebugMode.name: fallback_glitter_debug_mode
attrFallbackGlitterDebugMode.label: fallback glitter debug mode
attrFallbackGlitterDebugMode.comment: developer debug visualization modes.  This parameter will only be used when layering two distinct glitter materials.
